trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> to the event handlers that implement the command.
trans-unit.target: Associa un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> ai gestori di eventi che implementano il comando.

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding associates a command with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events which implement and determine the status of the command.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto CommandBinding associa un comando con il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> gli eventi che implementano e determinano lo stato del comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events are raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>metodo di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> gli eventi sulla destinazione del comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a CommandBinding for the command, the appropriate handlers are called.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando dispone di un oggetto CommandBinding per il comando, vengono chiamati i gestori appropriati.

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a CommandBinding for the command, the events are routed through the element tree until an element that has a CommandBinding is found.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando non dispone di un oggetto CommandBinding per il comando, gli eventi sono indirizzati attraverso l'albero degli elementi finché non viene trovato un elemento che dispone di un oggetto CommandBinding.

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding has limited use with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is not a<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto CommandBinding ha un utilizzo limitato con un, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>ovvero non un<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: This is because a CommandBinding binds the command to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> routed events which are raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> are called.
trans-unit.target: Infatti un CommandBinding associa il comando per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>che rimangono in attesa il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>degli eventi sono indirizzati generato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>vengono chiamati.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe tramite specificato <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Il comando su cui basare il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> in.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>e il valore specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Il comando su cui basare il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> in.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> evento sul nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>e il valore specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"> </xref> gestori eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Il comando su cui basare il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> in.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"> </xref> evento sul nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"> </xref> evento sul nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il comando associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> avvia un controllo per determinare se è possibile eseguire il comando sulla destinazione del comando.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>metodo su un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>evento viene generato il comando sulla destinazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the CanExecute event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se l'evento non viene gestita, viene generato l'evento CanExecute.

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando, il gestore CanExecute per che <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando non dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando, il CanExecute evento viene propagato nella struttura ad albero la ricerca di un elemento con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associato al comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | | -L'evento di tunneling corrispondente è .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Il comando associato a questa associazione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il comando associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> esegue.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene eseguita, viene generato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>eventi sulla destinazione del comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event is not handled, the Executed event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>evento non viene gestito, viene generato l'evento eseguite sulla destinazione del comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the specific command, the Executed handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando specifico, il gestore di esecuzione per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that specific command the Executed event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando non dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per tale comando specifica l'evento eseguite propagata nella struttura ad albero la ricerca di un elemento con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associato al comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is not found, the command is not handled.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>non viene trovato, il comando non è stato gestito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | | -L'evento di tunneling corrispondente è .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il comando associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> avvia un controllo per determinare se è possibile eseguire il comando sulla destinazione del comando corrente.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the PreviewCanExecute event is raised on the command target if the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>metodo su un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene chiamato, il PreviewCanExecute evento viene generato il comando sulla destinazione, se la destinazione del comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando non dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>evento viene propagato nella struttura ad albero la ricerca di un elemento con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associato al comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se non viene gestito l'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Tunneling | | Delegato | | -L'evento di bubbling corrispondente è .

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il comando associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> esegue.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the PreviewExecuted event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene eseguita, viene generato l'evento PreviewExecuted il comando sulla destinazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando di PreviewExecuted gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted event tunnels down the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Se la destinazione del comando non dispone di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per il comando i tunnel evento PreviewExecuted verso il basso l'albero degli elementi, la ricerca di un elemento con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>associato al comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the preview event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on command target.
trans-unit.target: Se non viene gestito l'evento di anteprima, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>evento comando sulla destinazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Tunneling | | Delegato | | -L'evento di bubbling corrispondente è .

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
